department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Acquisition of an anti-drone screen, including delivery to Ste-Anne-des-Plaines
description: PWGSC, on behalf of the Correctional Service Canada, is issuing this request for proposals (RFP) for the acquisition of an anti-drone screen including delivery to Ste-Anne-des-Plaines, as detailed in Annex Statement of requirement.
full_summary:
**Tender Announcement - Anti-Drone Screen Acquisition**
==============================================

**Tender Reference:** WS4241920481

**Publication Date:** October 4, 2023

**Closing Date:** October 16, 2023, at 2:00 PM (Eastern Time)

**Title:** Acquisition of an Anti-Drone Screen for Correctional Service Canada

**Description:**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of Correctional Service Canada (CSC), invites proponents to submit a proposal for the acquisition of an anti-drone screen, as detailed in the Annex Statement of Requirements.

**Scope of Work:**

The successful proponent will be responsible for delivering an anti-drone screen to Ste-Anne-des-Plaines, Quebec.

**Key Information:**

* **Classification:** *Doors and windows and glass* (30170000)
* **Trade Agreements:** This procurement is subject to the Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, and Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement.
* **Regions of Delivery:** Quebec (except the National Capital Region)
* **End-User Entity:** Correctional Service Canada (CSC)
* **Contact Information:**
  * Name: Alina Cocieru (SPAC/PSPC)
  * Email: [alina.cocieru@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:alina.cocieru@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Instructions to Proponents:**

To access the tender documentation, please visit the following URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17623388?extsite=MTc2MjMzODhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Please note that this tender has been cancelled.** No proposals will be accepted. Questions or concerns regarding this notification should be directed to the contact email. Closing date has been exceeded and the RFP is no longer current. 


## Step 1: Determine the key points to be included in the rewritten entry
The rewritten entry should include the following key points: title, reference number, publication date, closing date, description of the tender, details of the scope of work, key information, instructions to proponents, and contact information.

## Step 2: Rewrite the entry to ensure it is concise and in a professional tone
